Summary: three red lights in triangler form
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Sarasota
There was one other sighting in Sarasota on or around January 17th 2011
divs: Sighting Details At 6:50 pm I saw a slow moving triangler shaped object with a red light at each point moving south in the sky. It was big ,twice the size of a jet liner. I know what I saw it freaked me out a little, it looked just like the descriptions of other red triangle's. Also there was no sound, none at all. I am greatful, this is my second sighting within a month.
